C

changeMyRedoState(boolean) - Method in class gui.PPDrawingPanel
Changes the redo setting to enabled if true is passed or disabled if false is passed.
changeMyUndoState(boolean) - Method in class gui.PPDrawingPanel
Changes the undo setting to enabled if true is passed or disabled if false is passed.
clear() - Method in class gui.PPDrawingPanel
Clears the panel of PPGraphics.
createFileMenu(Action, Action, JFrame) - Method in class gui.PPMenuBar
Creates a file menu for the menu bar, which includes an undo, redo, clear, and exit button.
createGUIComponents() - Method in class gui.PowerPaintGUI
Sets up the GUI's components including custom actions, a menu bar, tool bar, and drawing panel.
createHelpMenu(JFrame) - Method in class gui.PPMenuBar
Creates a help menu for the menu bar with an about button.
createMenu(String, int) - Method in class gui.PPMenuBar
Creates and returns a JMenu based upon the given name and mnemonic, while adding it to the menu bar.
createMenuItem(String, int, JMenu) - Method in class gui.PPMenuBar
Creates and returns a JMenuItem based upon the given name and mnemonic, while adding it to the given menu.
createOptionsMenu() - Method in class gui.PPMenuBar
Create an options menu for the menu bar with a toggle grid check box and a slider to change thickness (line width).
createPPToolBar(Action[], Action) - Method in class gui.PPToolBar
Creates a tool bar with tool buttons for the given Actions.
createToolsMenu(Action[], Action) - Method in class gui.PPMenuBar
Creates a tools menu for the menu bar.
